CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, National Edition, May 29, 1948, pg. 10, reads: "PITTSBURGH'S CHAMP - Meet the champ, Howard Hawkins, newly crowned marble king who will represent the entire city of Pittsburgh in national championships in Atlantic City this summer. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: 1948 City of Pittsburgh marbles champion Howard Hawkins, crouching over marbles, with children gathered behind him including Betty, Walter Maddox, Eutie Napier, Lydia, Martha Ann Hawkins, Louis Turner, Richards, Larry Alexander, Wilford Rutherford, Willoby, Kendricks, and Lewis
